description: Come listen and learn about The Bredesen Protocol, a ground breaking approach for supporting brain health that has been founded on over 30 years of medical research into what causes Alzheimer's and how it can be treated. From this protocol, he's put into practice PreCODE, a program aimed at preventing the development of Alzheimer's, and ReCODE, a revolutionary treatment that reverses early stage dementia.
cleaned_text: Cutting Edge Treatment for Alzheimer's Discover Cutting Edge Treatment for Alzheimer's Details: Come listen and learn about The Bredesen Protocol, a ground breaking approach for supporting brain health that has been founded on over 30 years of medical research into what causes Alzheimer's and how it can be treated. From this protocol, he's put into practice PreCODE, a program aimed at preventing the development of Alzheimer's, and ReCODE, a revolutionary treatment that reverses early stage dementia. Presented By: Dr Royce Bargus Location: Edmond - Boulevard St 3325 S Blvd #169 Edmond, OK 73013-4808 United States
